Work 🎲
2022 - 2023

Senior Product Designer @ Polygon Tech

2019 - 2022
Founder @ Heeko -

In late 2019, I founded Heeko, a creative design and

technology company. Our team has been fortunate to work

with global brands such as Italic.com, Notpot, and

Trend.io.
2015 - 2019

Prior to Heeko, I worked as a designer at organizations

such as Quovantis, Wingify, and Synaptic. This

experience and knowledge strengthened my visual style,

technical skills, and business acumen.

Hello!

I’M A Digital Product designer focused

on the web/mobile, interaction, modern

aesthetics, branding, and design

systems. I take pleasure in creating

products that are simple, smart, and

user-friendly.

Over the years of designing, I have

honed my skills as a well-rounded

designer, confidently navigating every

aspect of the digital product creation

process, from start to finish.

Akash Tyagi
